metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10204 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the limit parameter in a log query request to index.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10204` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
